25574.name: Table of contents
25574.description:
使用方法

1. 选中 FRAME 图层

2. 运行插件

3. 将与选中图层名称相同的图层构建目录


How to use it

1. Select the FRAME layer

2. Run the plug-in

3. Build a catalog of layers with the same name as the selected layer
25574.release_notes:
New: Load feedback after running
Optimization: The display of catalog text
Optimization: Performance

24799.name: Don't Need
24799.description:
"Delete for now!"

"Next time!"

"Pend!"

Have you ever been in a sad situation like this?

This is the perfect plug-in for you.


How to

Simply select the FRAMES or COMPONENTS you no longer need and choose between 'Deleted', 'Pending', and 'Moved'.

(If you would like to use different wording, simply select "Customize".)


-------------------


せっかく頑張って作ったのに

「この画面・機能一旦なしで」

「一旦ペンディングで」

という台無しな一言…


Don't Needはこんな場面にピッタリのプラグインです。


使い方

一旦必要なくなったFRAMEやCOMPONENTを選択して「Deleted」「Pending」「Moved」から選ぶだけです。

（もし、他の文言を使いたい方は「Customize」を選択して文言を入れるだけです。）

24791.name: EasyFramer
24791.description:
Easily wrap your selected components, media or texts on a frame.

Only select all the resources you need to be wrapped on a frame, then you can run the plugin.


If you are a developer feel free to send pull requests on github.

25589.name: Typograff
25589.description:
Typograf is a plugin-wrapper for original ArtLebedevs design studio eponymous typograf. Plugin solves multiple typographical errors automatically. Web typography is an essential aspect of modern design. Typograf Figma plugin automatically removes unnecessary spaces, adding non-breaking spacing between a word and a preposition, changing (C) character to © and countless other fixes.


There is a lot to build in this plugin, so if you find it useful and want it be more useful please donate

My card is 4274 3201 0756 2699

25586.name: Color Contrast Grid
25586.description:
Not sure if the color you are using meets the contrast ratio?

Try this plug-in.

It outputs the contrast ratios for all possible combinations of color styles.


自分の使っているカラーがコントラスト比を満たしているかわからない？

そんな時はこのプラグインを使ってみましょう。

カラースタイルの全通りの組み合わせのコントラスト比を出力します。

25593.name: Palette builder
25593.description: Build color palette from hex colors in tailwind format
25593.release_notes: palletes builded with frames and autolayout

25587.name: Amounter
25587.description:
Are you tired of typing fake amounts all the time? Didn't even know currency formats can be so different? Well, today is your lucky day!


Make your selection, set your preferences, and this plugin will generate properly formatted amounts in any currency and language that exists on planet Earth.


For feedback or reporting an issue -> @noxiousone
25587.release_notes:
– Can generate amounts in FigJam as well
– Support for offline mode

24945.name: DesignGo
24945.description:
Простой, быстрый и удобный инструмент для коммуникации между дизайнером и клиентом

Оставляй комментарии и рисунки прямо в макете, отслеживай все изменения.

25421.name: Sur le pouce — thumbnail generator
25421.description:
User Studio's thumbnail generator for Figma files.

Includes:

  • current year
  • client name
  • project name
  • amount of phases
  • phase names
  • selection rectangle
  • generated background

manifest.name: Sur le pouce — thumbnail generator by User Studio

25264.name: locize
25264.description:
What is locize?

﻿

locize is a new online service that offers true continuous localization. The translations are managed in your locize project and published from there to the locize CDN to be consumed from your application. The localization team can take care of the translations from the first day and keep up with changes with ease. The processes are separated. Translations can be updated without the need to release an update of your app. locize is bridging the gap between translation and development!


Best for


All involved in the software localization process: Developers, Designers, Team Leads, Heads of Engineering, Translation/Localization team, Product Managers, Project Leaders, Marketing, etc...

 

For more information please visit: https://locize.com

 

Why connect locize and Figma?

 

Bridging the gap between translation and design with locize, a modern and affordable localization-management-platform. It makes your website, app, game or whatever your project is, global, vibrant, and more engaging especially when unleashing the continuous localization capabilities.


Pushing texts from Figma to locize. Send first text content from within Figma to locize in seconds so that your Translators can start their work right away.

 

Try your designs in a different language by fetching other translations directly into Figma. Preview your designs in all your languages before handoff to Developers.

 

Increase your overall translation quality and reduce feedback loops.


How to set up

For more information and to learn how to install the plugin visit https://docs.locize.com/more/figma-plugin

Don’t have a locize account? Try it for free! https://www.locize.app/register

25621.name: Figma ML
25621.description: A project using TensorFlow JS to create the spell check of design systems, that helps designers by keep-watching numerous design elements instead of humans.

25258.name: Bitmap Tool
25258.description:
一些实用的位图功能


#### 位图等比缩放

快速将位图缩放至1倍、2倍等整数倍；


#### 精灵图裁剪

将 sheetpng 按行列裁剪成宽高相等的序列帧图片；


#### 切片转png

将带有导出选项的切片/形状等转成png，并自动添加到舞台上；



#### 选中切片生成gif

选中 切片/frame 等对象后快速生成gif；

图层名后加“#500ms”字样可以自定单帧的延迟；

gif序列帧先后顺序按图层层级排列；



#### 导入lottie序列帧

导入lottie动画到舞台，特别适合导入矢量动画到舞台；


#### 组件转画框

快速将 compent 转成frame
25258.release_notes: gif序列帧的前后顺序按图层层级前后处理
